critique: The document is a formal executive order addressing a national emergency related to the assassination of Rafiq Hariri and actions of the Syrian government. The primary emotion conveyed is a sense of seriousness and determination to address a threat. There is an element of disgust and anger towards the perpetrators of the terrorist act. There might be a bit of sadness related to the death of the victims. There is no surprise or joy conveyed in the document. The scores are based on the intensity of these emotions that the American public is expected to feel upon reading this document.
